mapper.select: SELECT T1.*, T2.ITEM_CATE_NAME FROM (select c1.*, cm.ITEM_IMG_NAME from CAT_ITEM C1 INNER JOIN (SELECT ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_IMG_NAME FROM CAT_ITEM_IMG C2 INNER JOIN CAT_ITEM_IMG_REL C3 ON C2.ITEM_IMG_SEQ = C3.ITEM_IMG_SEQ) Cm ON C1.ITEM_SEQ = Cm.ITEM_SEQ) T1 INNER JOIN (select c1.*, cm2.ITEM_CATE_NAME from CAT_ITEM C1 INNER JOIN (SELECT ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_CATE_NAME FROM CAT_ITEM_CATE C4 INNER JOIN CAT_ITEM_CATE_REL C5 ON C4.ITEM_CATE_SEQ = C5.ITEM_CATE_SEQ) Cm2 ON C1.ITEM_SEQ = Cm2.ITEM_SEQ) T2 ON T1.ITEM_SEQ = T2.ITEM_SEQ

SELECT T1.*, T2.ITEM_CATE_NAME FROM (select c1.*, cm.ITEM_IMG_NAME from CAT_ITEM C1 INNER JOIN (SELECT ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_IMG_NAME FROM CAT_ITEM_IMG C2 INNER JOIN CAT_ITEM_IMG_REL C3 ON C2.ITEM_IMG_SEQ = C3.ITEM_IMG_SEQ) Cm ON C1.ITEM_SEQ = Cm.ITEM_SEQ) T1 INNER JOIN (select c1.*, cm2.ITEM_CATE_NAME from CAT_ITEM C1 INNER JOIN (SELECT ITEM_SEQ, ITEM_CATE_NAME FROM CAT_ITEM_CATE C4 INNER JOIN CAT_ITEM_CATE_REL C5 ON C4.ITEM_CATE_SEQ = C5.ITEM_CATE_SEQ) Cm2 ON C1.ITEM_SEQ = Cm2.ITEM_SEQ) T2 ON T1.ITEM_SEQ = T2.ITEM_SEQ
where T1.ITEM_SEQ = #{ITEM_SEQ}
